column1: Paul then began felling trees and working away as hard as he could
column2: but no matter how he cut and how he worked he could only turn out pig troughs. He did not give in
column4: but worked away till far into the afternoon before he thought of taking any food; then all at once he became hungry and opened his bag
column5: but not a crumb could he find. Paul became so angry he turned the bag inside out and struck it against the stump of a tree; then lie took his ax
column7: and set off homeward.As soon as Paul returned
column8: Ashiepattle wanted to set out and asked his mother for a bag of food."Perhaps I can manage to build the ship and win the princess and half the kingdom
column11: said his mother. Are you likely to win the princess
column13: who never do anything but root and dig in the ashes? No
column14: you shan't have any bag with food!"
